column5: As many of you know I'm super jet lagged from my recent trip to China, I decided to take advantage of my 3AM wakeup schedule. Went fishing with fellow member Kevin, the forecast was calling for 25km winds and light shower. A bumpy ride to our spot and the bite was on fire starting 8-9ish, at the peak period I had missed multiple consecutive bites within seconds. My 30LB byers anchor really held nicely, but a pain in the @ss to pulled it backup for my anchor boy.    Depth: 75~80 FOW Lure: William 1/2, Bad Boy, Jigging Raps Colour: Anything green! Weather: Overcast Surface Temperature: ~41F Notes: Saw quite a few dying smelt on the surface.     To my surprise we didn't see anyone jig up a Laker, I had my trolling stuff ready but didn't want to give up the hot whitie bite.       I've always had good luck with William W60 Silver Electric Blue, behind a dipsy diver. The live-forage Smelt looks real good to match the hatch. Anyone has recommendation for laker trolling lures?    We had over a dozen fish landed and many lost!
nice going guys

Silver Fox flutter spoons.Assortment of colours. Ones that worked for me were the Orange prizm on Silver,light blue aswell. Watermellon is a good go to also. Expect alot of herring hook ups.Crazy things will hit anything.1.2-1.5 mph  I cant see the pics,but great report. If I get my tuck back by the weeked,I,ll be heading over that way.
Very nice fish. Good sizes too! Thanks for posting.
Well done.  Thanks for the report.
Thanks for the report.  I'll be heading out for my fist run at them next week.  And I'll be sure to pack some Green lures..
~~~Great pics, like the Widdle White Twacker, look good next to my Widdle Green Twacker.
Great report!  Thanks for all the details.  Congrats on the whities!
Nice going
Well done boys!  That looks like Sibalds launch. I heard they were doing some work on it, how is the luanch?
Nice work guys!  Open water whities! I'm kinda jealous, even if I have my boat fixed it won't be able to handle big water like that.
Nice man!  Always fun to hang out in the middle of the floatilla   any Russian dudes in dingies this year?  lol
Nice! Open water whities/lakers sounds so fun.
Nice boat and nice whities.
Awesome man! Nice little report and good inspiration to get out there. Like the action shots!
Stellar! I'm hoping I can get a day or two up there....SOON!
Maybe I missed any changes to the ramp, but I know for sure they made the dock much nicer with new planks and heavy duty cleats.
Nice work! Always a great feeling having a good day on Simcoe.
Nice shooting boys!!!  For Lakers - Northern King Magnums...watermelon ,yellow,green or any copper coloured Gibbs....

NICE catch.....love seeing whitefish caught....I have only caught one myself and just LOVE the taste of smoked whitefish.  GREAT fishing report....lots of info to help others get out and fish without pointing out your honey hole....very well done.  Now how are you going to enjoy those whitefish ??? Baked, broiled, fried or smoked ???  Bob
